name: Dutch Oven Beef Pot Roast
steps: Mix 1-2 tablespoons Garlic powder, 1 tsp Salt, Â½ tsp Pepper. Cover meat with the seasoning mix
Sear meat on med-high for 3 min each side
To pan meat was seared in, saute the onion and garlic
Add broth, tomato paste, worcestershire sauce, thyme, rosemary, sage, bay leaves to the pan & simmer, scraping off browned bits in the pan
Add the sauce to the dutch oven
Add meat, then top with celery and carrots
Cover, cook in the oven for 4 hours
Remove and let sit for 15 min
story: If you're feeling really crazy, add wine to the deglazing step :)
